Ceno Browser | Share the Web

Partilhe a web!

Ceno (short for censorship.no!) is the world‚Äôs first mobile browser that side-steps current Internet censorship methods. Its peer-to-peer backbone allows people to access and share web information in and across regions where connectivity has been interrupted or compromised.

Desbloqueie a Web

Access web content through a network of cooperating peers - even when the internet is down or censored. Install Ceno Browser today and be prepared for the next time you get üîå unplugged.

Fa√ßa a rede crescer

Fight censorship by becoming a bridge! Install and run Ceno Browser to instantly join the network and expand the availability of blocked websites to those in censored countries.

Gratuito e de C√≥digo Aberto

Ceno is based on Mozilla Android Components, extended to make use of the Ouinet library - enabling third party developers to incorporate the Ceno network into their apps for P2P connectivity.


Ceno Browser is a project by eQualit.ie ‚Äì a not-for-profit Canadian company developing open and reusable systems with a focus on privacy, online security and freedom of association. Technology solutions and innovations are driven by our values that guide us to protect the rights and aspirations of everyone online.
